PDDL_ACTION.description:
Cooking: 
- The precondition is, that the Chef wants to cook the food (e.g. has to cook it) f.e. if the waiter ordered some food for the guests.
- The effect is, that the Chef has the food available now, and (because he cooked it) dosen't want it anymore.
- Modeling is really inaccurate, and  ends here. e.g. the Chef needs not to be in the kitchen, needs no ingredients and so on...
--> In this Action Food can be created
